content: michelle s dishcloth pattern this dishcloth pattern is by michelle stone ***© this pattern is not for resale and does not include resale rights reproducing and distributing this pattern in purchased my pattern my patterns are listed on ravelry and etsy you have permission to sell your finished dishcloths just please leave a link to my pattern thank you supplies needed 100% cotton yarn- i used lily sugar n cream 5mm h hook yarn needle to weave in ends abbreviations slip_stitch- slip_stitch st- stitch chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet round- round notes chain 1 does not count as a stitch my dishcloth measured 6 ½ x7 you can change hook size or beginning chain count to make yours bigger or smaller chain an odd number so after turning and single_crochet in each st you end up with an even number of stitches this will make it wider to make taller just repeat round 2 as many times as you need to reach desired height round 1 chain 21 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each st across 20 round 2 chain 1 turn skip first st single_crochet and double_crochet in next st *skip st single_crochet and double_crochet in next st* repeat between * * till the end of the round 20 round 3-16 repeat round 2 round 17 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 20 round 18 chain 1 do not turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet evenly down side of dishcloth in corner do single_crochet ch1 single_crochet single_crochet evenly on bottom of dishcloth in corner do single_crochet ch1 single_crochet single_crochet evenly up the side of the dishcloth at the end of this row you will chain 1 then slip_stitch to the top of the first st in round 17 weave in ends congratulations you have completed the dishcloth i hope you enjoy making many of these in many different colors
